answers.answer: Contact www.jdrf.org (Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation) and fill in the request form for the Online Diabetes Support Team (ODST), asking them to help identify some programs. I wish him the very best.

question: I am trying to find a study or program to help my brother with his lines for his pump or for help in a pancreas transplant he has no insurance and is a brittle diabetic he has been told if he does not have a pancreas transplant he will die within a year .........is there any help out there for him ????
title: pancreas transplants
